alert.note: Alert for NCC000 (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued May 02 at 6:12AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...EAS Child Abduction Emergency... The following message is transmitted at the request of FL. ...THIS IS A NORTH CAROLINA AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION....THE WINSTON SALEM POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR JAIR JUNIOR GASGA-ESPINOZA. JAIR IS A 17 YEAR-OLD HISPANIC MALE APPROXIMATELY 5 FOOT 11 INCHES TALL WEIGHING 200 POUNDS. HE HAS SHORT BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. JAIR WAS LAST SEEN WEARING A WHITE TEE SHIRT GRAY SWEAT PANTS AND WHITE TENNIS SHOES AND A BLACK BASEBALL HAT. HE WAS LAST SEEN AT 555 NORTH MARTIN LUTHER KING DR. IN WINSTON SALEM. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION CALL WINSTON SALEM POLICE IMMEDIATELY AT 336 773 7700 OR CALL 911 OR STAR 47 ACTIVATE CMAS IN REGION 7...
